name: weak-daemon
author: Wojciech Fiderek <wojciech.fiderek.dev@gmail.com>
__types_comment: (!) For testing purposes leave types in lib directory

scripts.move-type-files: echo move-type-files CURRENTLY SHOULD NOT BE USED && ERROR && (rm -rf types && mkdir types && cd lib  &&  find . -name '*.d.ts' -exec cp --parents '{}' ./../types ';'  &&  find ./../lib -type f -name '*.d.ts' -delete )
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
